text: Nikola Jovović (born 13 February 1992) is a Serbian volleyball player, a member of Serbia men's national volleyball team and Russian club Ural Ufa. Gold medalist of the 2019 CEV European Championship and 2016 FIVB World League. ==Career== ===National team=== On 19 July 2015 Serbian national team with Jovović in squad made it to the final of the FIVB World League, but lost with France 0–3 and eventually achieved silver medal. ==Sporting achievements== * National championships ** 2007/2008 16px Serbian Championship, with Vojvodina Novi Sad ** 2008/2009 16px Serbian Championship, with Vojvodina Novi Sad ** 2010/2011 16px Serbian Championship, with Vojvodina Novi Sad ** 2011/2012 16px German Cup, with VfB Friedrichshafen ** 2011/2012 16px German Championship, with VfB Friedrichshafen ** 2012/2013 16px German Championship, with VfB Friedrichshafen ** 2013/2014 16px German Cup, with VfB Friedrichshafen ** 2013/2014 16px German Championship, with VfB Friedrichshafen ** 2017/2018 16px Turkish Championship, with Arkas İzmir * National team ** 2009 16px CEV U19 European Championship ** 2009 16px FIVB U19 World Championship ** 2010 16px CEV U20 European Championship ** 2011 16px FIVB U21 World Championship ** 2013 16px CEV European Championship ** 2013 16px FIVB U23 World Championship ** 2015 16px FIVB World League ** 2016 16px FIVB World League ** 2017 16px CEV European Championship ** 2019 16px CEV European Championship ===Individually=== * 2009: CEV U19 European Championship – Best Setter * 2013: CEV European Championship – Fair Play Award ==References== ==External links== * Player profile at WorldofVolley.com * Player profile at LegaVolley.it * Player profile at Volleybox.net Category:Living people
